alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 1:07PM CDT until July 16 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 107 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Daleville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Headland, Dothan, Fort Novosel, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Newville, Napier Field, Haleburg, Hollis Dairy Road and Tumbleton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
